name: Cake & Arrow
tagline: Services that move people to action.
description:
Cake & Arrow is an award-winning digital customer experience agency that builds exceptional online experiences for innovative brands. They develops digital products & services with a focus on ecommerce websites, lead-generation, salesforce enablement.
Their 14 years’ experience in finance, retail, business & professional services, fashion & luxury and private equity has earned them clients such as MetLife, KIND Snacks, Saks Fifth Avenue, Genpact, ProSight, Lowe’s and Catbird.
